control.description-key: Dynamic Kanban Board Component with Configurable States

property-set.name: title
property-set.description-key: Title or description of the task

property.name: columnDefinitions
property.description-key: JSON array defining columns

property.name: quickColumnSetup
property.description-key: Quick setup format: Status1,Status2,Status3

property.name: boardHorizontalAlignment
property.description-key: Options: Left,Center,Right,Stretch

property.name: columnsHorizontalAlignment
property.description-key: Options: Left,Center,Right,Stretch

property.name: cardsVerticalAlignment
property.description-key: Options: Top,Middle,Bottom,Stretch

property.name: textAlignment
property.description-key: Options: Left,Center,Right,Justify

property.name: enableMultilineText
property.description-key: Allow text to wrap to multiple lines

property.name: maxTextLines
property.description-key: Maximum number of lines to display (default: 3)

property.name: textLineHeight
property.description-key: Line height multiplier (default: 1.5)

property.name: enableWordWrap
property.description-key: Allow text to break at word boundaries

property.name: showTextTooltip
property.description-key: Show full text on hover when truncated

property.name: tasksData
property.description-key: JSON string containing tasks data - use for testing only

property.name: updatedTasksData
property.description-key: Updated tasks data after drag and drop

property.description-key: Information about the last moved task

property.description-key: Triggers when a task needs to be updated

property.description-key: Current active column configuration as JSON
